name: Space Hunt (itch) (Disappointedcreeper)
description:
Developed by Disappointedcreeper Music by Connor Wolfe CONTROLLS

ROTATE - WASD

MOVE FORWARD - SPACE BAR

CANCEL MOMENTUM - TAB

SLOW TIME - SHIFT

SWAP POWER-UP - Q

HOW TO PLAY

Avoid the meteors and space junk, collect the blue and green orbs. Collecting the orbs will charge a power-up. Barrier protects you, lazers fire if you press space.

Audio is broken in the web version.

Better experience in web version on https://disappointedcreeper.github.io/games/spacehunt/ on Itch.io the UI did not scale properly
